com.naveen.datagen

Class DatabaseOperations

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.naveen.datagen.DatabaseOperations

  • final class DatabaseOperations
extends java.lang.Object
    This class performs the role of connecting with the database and executing the queries and returning the result

    naveen
